reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress comfortable, not itchy at all, and worth the low cost. Customers disagree on the sizing, with some finding it fits great while others say it's a bit big.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Dress
items.body: Absolutely love this dress! It is perfect for one of our dress up days for my bachelorette party in Nashville. I am curvy 5'7" 195 lbs and I got a large. I was VERY worried it would be too fit and not be flowy due to my hips, but I wouldn't size up at all it fit perfect. The dress is not only beautiful, its comfortable. I was worried about how short it would be and it's not too short at all. The material is very good quality and is not itchy at all. Read more
items.author: Mikayla

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great dress for a night out
items.body: Ran a bit big in the sides and if you have large breasts you will probably need some boob/dress tape. But for the price it was great! Also hides an apron belly well! The tie was very long because I’m short but the dress looked great on and was comfortable. Read more
items.author: aja kynard

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this sparkly dress!
items.body: This dress is very flattering. I was looking for a sparkly dress for a holiday party that covered my belly. I can’t wear tight fitted dresses anymore & this dress was super cute & comfortable. I’m 4’11” & 120 lbs. I have a small chest, but I thought it still looked good. I ordered the small & it was for perfect! Read more
items.author: Daniele Blackburn

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Fun party dress, but couldn’t fill it out
items.body: I was pleasantly surprised at this dress! I am somewhere between a small and medium (pear shaped), and I sized down to a small because I have a smaller chest. Ultimately I returned it because even with a size Small I couldn’t fill it out in the chest area. The skirt is flown and forgiving and it was a pretty good length on me… For reference, I am about 5‘4“. The rose gold color was really pretty, but it didn’t do me any favors as it was a little too close to my fair skin tone. Otherwise could be a great party dress! Read more
items.author: katie

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Sent an obviously used and dirty dress
items.body: This dress was shipped to me obviously worn by someone. There is still tape in the dress from where she used fabric to skin tape to keep the neckline in place. Read more
items.author: Jessica

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous sparkly dress
items.body: Loved this dress so much! I got a medium since everyone said it ran large and it fit perfectly. I got some many compliments all night long! Read more
items.author: Homeswithceline

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect party dress
items.body: This dress is absolutely beautiful and comfortable. This dress is fantastic for larger chested women. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful color true to photo
items.body: Beautiful color, runs big. The belt is weirds once it wraps around it spent necessarily sit like a belt on the dress but instead on your actual body! This has potential, but I didn’t look. Flattering on me unfortunately. I found the cut in the front no flattering for a smaller frame body like mine. Read more
items.author: Sarah

short_description:
Womens Dress V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Dress V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Black Gold, Black Green, Rose Gold, Black, Navy Blue, Champagne Gold, Dark Green, Silver, Lake Blue, Wine Red, Pink, Lake Green, Purple, Royal Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
